content: this pattern is not my design it is a handed down and passed around pattern i simply wrote it up to share with others because i love these potholders so much i learned it from looking at potholders made before i was born let me know if you have any questions update 04-decrease-2012 helene eclatdusoleil has done a wonderful french translation with more photos of this pattern check it out here 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/manique-au-crochet-traduction
